author: Caitlin Oprysko
title: 'No problem whatsoever': Trump downplays Fauci absence at coronavirus briefing
description: Fauci is a regular presence at the briefings, but has raised questions about administration policy.
content:
Minutes earlier, however, a White House official chalked up Faucis disappearance from the daily briefing to a matter of having limited space onstage in the briefing room.
"We had to social distance. We are announcing [Centers for Disease Control and Preventi… [+1379 chars]
